doc_class_description: A Court of Appeal judgment is a higher court ruling that reviews decisions of lower courts, shaping legal precedent and protecting citizens’ rights.

latest_doc_d.description: Abeyweera Mirissa Patabendige Badrajith Harshanath Abeyweera Vs. Attorney General before Hon. Amal Ranaraja, J.
latest_doc_d.parties: Abeyweera Mirissa Patabendige Badrajith Harshanath Abeyweera Vs. Attorney General
latest_doc_d.keywords: Absolute owner of the vehicle used in a forest offence – Responsibility of a party prosecuting his case effectively –Prompt action and diligence in legal process
latest_doc_d.legistation: Section 20 and 40 of the Forest Ordinance No.16 of 1907 (as amended)
